Articles.Content:
Hello everyone! I need some help

For my web design class we need to make a website for a fake restaurant (I does not have to be serious so humor away!). I need a some good ideas for the name as well as the food server there, try to make it kerbal based but if you have a really go joke just go for it.

Here is the URL, there is nothing there now and i will be working on basic versions of it so dont judge the basic HTML start!

TheLunchPad

-Thanks LePengiun

Edited September 20, 2015 by krona14
Serve snacks and orange-flavored rocket fuel.

Hmmm. How about 'The Launch Pad!' for the name then having a running joke on the site where you use 'Launch' in place of 'Lunch.'

You could have different burger sizes set in stages. A One-Stage burger has only one patty, but they go up to a Three-stage.

Instead of 'Well' or Medium' you get 'Full Throttle or Half-throttle'

*thinks of more bad puns*

Milkshakes called Moonshakes and come with little rocket ship straws.

Hmmm. How about 'The Launch Pad!' for the name then having a running joke on the site where you use 'Launch' in place of 'Lunch.'

You could have different burger sizes set in stages. A One-Stage burger has only one patty, but they go up to a Three-stage.

Instead of 'Well' or Medium' you get 'Full Throttle or Half-throttle'

*thinks of more bad puns*

Milkshakes called Moonshakes and come with little rocket ship straws.

Hah, nice pun.

Cocktails could be called Boosters for that quick energy boost.

Eve's Slice... an Purple cake with berries on top...

and can have some astronaut foods too...

and the place can be called Kerbonaut's

Of course - you're going to serve Mystery Goo, yes?

- - - Updated - - -

Wow... I just noticed your avatar. Back in 2000, I had the exact same graphic only it read "Forums Patrolled By LordFerret"... I was a forums administrator back then.
And what about an "asteroid menu" for the Kerbi-kiddies...

Hmmm. How about 'The Launch Pad!' for the name then having a running joke on the site where you use 'Launch' in place of 'Lunch.'

How about... Space Bar?

Of course - you're going to serve Mystery Goo, yes?

- - - Updated - - -

Wow... I just noticed your avatar. Back in 2000, I had the exact same graphic only it read "Forums Patrolled By LordFerret"... I was a forums administrator back then.

Mystery Goo is a delicacy! also that is awesome, ferrets are the best!

How about... Space Bar?

It did take me a while to figure out that the spacebar is literally a bar you push when you want to go to space
Just don't forget the Minmus Mint Ice Cream.

Don't forget to add the Kraken Chow to the menu - it doesn't need to be seafood Burning Eeloo - ice cream doused in alcohol and set on fire. Mission Failure - green pea soup. And of course Asparagus Launcher - a dish of asparagus stalks with hot sauce
How abot making the whole world your restaurant and deliver your meals with ICBMs?

How abot making the whole world your restaurant and deliver your meals with ICBMs?

YES! now they are called: "inter-continental ballistic meals"

Hmmm. How about 'The Launch Pad!' for the name then having a running joke on the site where you use 'Launch' in place of 'Lunch.'

You could have different burger sizes set in stages. A One-Stage burger has only one patty, but they go up to a Three-stage.

Instead of 'Well' or Medium' you get 'Full Throttle or Half-throttle'

*thinks of more bad puns*

Milkshakes called Moonshakes and come with little rocket ship straws.

I love this so much. But I would change it to "The Lunch Pad" as a pun. I really like the burger idea
you cant forget the Minmus ice cream....

Kraken Custard - on the dessert menu

The Out-gassing Lounge - bathroom

Time-Warp - an alcoholic beverage/cocktail served at the bar

"Valentina" - a non-alcoholic beverage served at the bar, equivalent to a "Shirley Temple"

Docking Ports - instead of parking spaces, MK3 vehicles always welcome

Frozen Nitrogen Ice Slushies, in various flavors - for the kids

a "Monopropellants Menu" section - for those who are "Oxidizer Intolerant"

The restaurant could also be equipped with the SCANseat v10 - the ultimate in table seating reservation systems

And of course, all meal preparations are overseen by MechChef - the universe renowned cook

PayPal accepted
How about Milliway's? It's the Restaurant at the end of universe!

Minmus Ice Cream.

Both of us would be pleased to have that in the menu.
Spaghetti and Meteors with a side of hand battered Kracken!

Kraken Kalamari

"The Lunch Pad" is good. There's a place here called Booster Juice (healthy smoothie-type stuff) which I think must be worked into your project.
The plus side of any space restaurant is that it can be an extremely efficient space vehicle via the strange and unusual natural force of bistromathics.

"You cannot time warp faster than 1x while your dish is under preparation."

---

Also :

- "Yes, we even serve gruel. Do you prefer it liquid or solid, sir ?"

- "A cupola of coffee, maybe ?"

- "Jeez, it's always the same story, the kid wants his graviolis..."

- ice cream nosecones (don't keep the pointy end towards space)

- the inevitable 2HOT chili sauce.
Some sort of alcoholic beverage called 'Hydrazine' or 'Space Pruno'

"Vegetable Assembly Building"

A section laid out like a large salad buffet.

"Spaceplane Hamburger"

A buffet to grab grilled food.

"Lunch Pad"

Dining area.

Just some silly ideas. Maybe I should go with dessert names?

A scoop of Minmus pudding? Maybe some Mun rock candy as well? Perhaps even a Dunaght! Or would you prefer plain ol' Ike's cream?

Just some water? Fresh from Laythe! Or maybe some Bop?

Edited September 19, 2015 by Xannari Ferrows
